text: Berkshire Hathaway $BRK.B sold most of its Ulta Beauty $ULTA stake during 24Q3 (disclosed mid-Nov) ULTA share price has risen 21% since end of 24Q3 Stockpicking is "simple but not easy"

I own all of the 3 mentioned here $BRK.B, $JEPQ & $O. For me probably $MO cause at the moment is my largest individual holding.

Key ingredient at $BRK.B is executives selling great businesses to BRK then staying to run them This depends on Buffett reputation for leaving subsidiaries alone in everything Ackman couldn't resist giving $UBER product ideas in public with ~1.5% stake

Final Quack! Adding $BRK.B isn‚Äôt about chasing returns.  It‚Äôs about aligning my portfolio with a structure that quietly compounds over decades.  It‚Äôs boring in the best way ‚Äî and that‚Äôs why I love it. Any other first time buyers? #PatitosFortune #BRKB #weirdportfolio #MondayStockShopping

Warren Buffett sold more Bank of America $BAC $BRK.B "sold $896m of the stock this week. That means total proceeds from share disposals since mid-July and dividends earned since 2011 have surpassed the $14.6bn" entry cost Will soon be < 10% disclosure threshold www.bloomberg.com/news/article...

"Warren Buffett Sells More BofA Shares" $BAC $BRK.B "has trimmed the stake by a total of almost 13% in a series of sales since mid-July, generating $5.4bn" "Remains the bank‚Äôs biggest stockholder" ($35.9bn) www.bloomberg.com/news/article...

With $234.6 Billion, Warren Buffet now holds more US Treasury Bills than the Federal Reserve. Buffett and Berkshire Hathaway $BRK.B own 4% of all T-Bills issued to the public. If invested in 3-month Treasury bills at about 5%, $200 Billion in cash would generate about $10 Billion a year. Insane.
